attributes.action: ask the BBC to get Joss Wheedon in to write any Doctor's Daughter spin-offs that the BBC has planned for the next few years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
